item.title: Spot painting, randomly
item.description: Damien Hirsts’ paintings with random coloured dots on white canvas go for thousands, e.g. this 8x6 regular grid spot-painting, canvas size 50.0 x 71.1cm, with price tag of £15k-20k: Figure 1: ©artsy.net As I work with points scattered on various sub-spaces, I decided to write a small Shiny-app for generating such spot patterns. Here is an example with similar specs as the £20k painting: Figure 2: Generated automatically The app is available at Shinyapps, “Spot painting”.
